description:
In order to make her father, Tokishirou, happy, Himeno hopes that she can win some sort of prize.
What`s the result of the contest?!
On a later day, Himeno and her friends have a celebration for the contest.
Meanwhile, Tokishirou, who had snuck out, couldn`t resist sitting on Himeno`s ceramic cushion and then...
Source: crunchyroll
